label: Maximum leakage to 163 bulk
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Maximum leakage to 163 bulk. Validation: Seal tight enough for universe
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
sterile = reg.sterile_sector     # 163 - Hidden bulk sector
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288 - Total root lattice

# Sterile-active mixing: maximum leakage ratio to bulk
# theta_sterile = 163/288 defines the seal tightness
theta_sterile = sterile / roots  # 0.566 - Mixing angle
sterile_ratio = reg.sterile_ratio  # Direct from registry

# Verify seal is tight enough for observable universe
verified = abs(theta_sterile - sterile_ratio) < 1e-10
verified = verified and theta_sterile < 0.6  # Must be bounded
